trans-unit.source: Wraps a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包裝 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes that are associated with this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個欄位關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that declares this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得宣告這個欄位的型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object for the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 宣告這個成員之類別的 <see langword="Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the internal metadata representation of this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個欄位內部中繼資料表示的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the internal metadata representation of this field.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位內部中繼資料表示的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個欄位的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of this field.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位的型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this field.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，這個陣列包含已附加至這個欄位的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this field.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，這個陣列包含已附加至這個欄位的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 無元素的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this field, searching only for attributes of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，這個陣列包含已附加至這個欄位的自訂屬性，只搜尋指定之型別的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 無元素的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object whose field value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 將傳回其欄位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 取得欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute type to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified attribute type is attached to this field.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的屬性型別是否已附加至這個欄位。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of member that this field is.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個欄位成員的型別。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of class derived from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> that this class derives from.
trans-unit.target: 識別衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> (這個類別的衍生來源) 之類別的型別。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Field" />, because this class derives from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Field" />，因為這個類別衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this field.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of this field.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來透過反映取得這個執行個體的類別物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object that was used to obtain this method.
trans-unit.target: 用於取得這個方法的 <see langword="Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 設定欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose field value will be set.
trans-unit.target: 將設定其欄位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the field.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the field, using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值，設定欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose field value will be set.
trans-unit.target: 將設定其欄位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the field.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control the binding.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，進行控制繫結。

trans-unit.source: A set of properties that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, and invocation of members through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 透過反映來啟用繫結、強制引數型別和成員引動過程的一組屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides information about a specific culture or locale.
trans-unit.target: 提供特定文化特性或地區設定的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
trans-unit.target: 用來正確格式化數字、日期和字串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the field, using the specified value, culture, and binding information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值、文化特性和繫結資訊，設定欄位的值。
